part.Name: Description
part.Short: It refracts light around its sleek metal surface. The circuitry beneath issues its silent report at regular intervals.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text:
Applies a beacon, which keeps track of a creature or object's location in your journal.
Can only be applied to metallic creatures and objects.

part.Name: Description
part.Short: A slender metal tube. Thousands of nanites float in a silver suspension.

part.Name: RulesDescription
part.Text:
Applies a beacon, which keeps track of a creature or object's location in your journal.
Can only be applied to creatures or objects that are organic and have a circulatory system.
